name: Scrap Seas Demo
description:
Scrap Seas is a 3D Vehicle 3rd-Person Shooter Rogue-Like.  Build and pilot your ship through a lively comic book world where the ocean has reclaimed the earth.  Play on either controller or keyboard.  

BUILD YOUR SHIP

Start with a cool boat and fight your way to an EPIC BOAT! Then take that awesome boat and fill it with every kind of cannon, laser beam, and whatever the hell else you can find. You can also collect comic book panels which can provide a variety of buffs to your ship. Ah, and don't forget about melee weapons. Every boat worth piloting needs some buzz saws, or at least some electrified spikes strapped on.

FIGHT!

Use your fire power and maneuvering skills to sink ships, robots, and other stuff. Destroy your enemies.  Use your boosters to ram into enemy ships head on or to avoid attacks like a coward.

DON'T DIE!

Just make sure you don't DIE, because if you DIE you'll die forever, and I can't have that on my conscience.

THANKS FOR PLAYING!

The Scrap Seas Demo has 5 levels to play through  with more content coming soon!  If you like our game, be sure to share it with your friends, leave a review, or press the "Back us on kickstarter" button on the end screen.
